code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Button,Menu,Typography,Avatar}from'antd';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{HomeOutlined,MoneyCollectOutlined,BulbOutlined,FundOutlined,MenuOutlined}from'@ant-design/icons';import icon from'../images/cryptocurrency.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[activeMenu,setActiveMenu]=useState(true);const[screenSize,setScreenSize]=useState(undefined);useEffect(()=>{const handleResize=()=>setScreenSize(window.innerWidth);window.addEventListener('resize',handleResize);handleResize();return()=>window.removeEventListener('resize',handleResize);},[]);useEffect(()=>{if(screenSize<=800){setActiveMenu(false);}else{setActiveMenu(true);}},[screenSize]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{src:icon,size:"large"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography.Title,{level:2,className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"CryptoIntel"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"menu-control-container",onClick:()=>setActiveMenu(!activeMenu),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuOutlined,{})})]}),activeMenu&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Menu,{theme:"dark",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu.Item,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomeOutlined,{}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu.Item,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FundOutlined,{}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cryptocurrencies",children:"Cryptocurrencies"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu.Item,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoneyCollectOutlined,{}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/exchanges",children:"Exchanges"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu.Item,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BulbOutlined,{}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/news",children:"News"})})]})]});};export default Navbar;
